featured.text: As of May 1, 1995, all nationals of the following 15 countries are exempted from securing visas for entry into the Republic of China: U.S.A., Japan, Canada, Belgium, Luxembourg, Sweden, Holland, New Zealand, Australia, Austria, Germany, Britain, France, Spain, and Portugal.
Much larger clear blocks are produced in Europe and Canada or harvested from a frozen river in Sweden.

definition.zh_def: 瑞典，位於北歐的國家，以其美麗的自然風光和高生活品質而聞名。
definition.en_def: Sweden, a country in Northern Europe known for its beautiful landscapes and high quality of life.
definition.example: Sweden is famous for its stunning archipelagos and vibrant cities.
